name: Procedural Corrector
description:
Procedural Corrector is a small game made by a game design student in a few weeks.

Your goal in the game is to help the little slime fellow go as far as he can through an endless level by moving blocks to grant him safe passage across chasm and over obstacles by moving around the blocks the level is built out of. 

Controls:

The character moves and jumps automatically.

The player moves a block by hovering their cursor over it and pressing wasd or the arrowkeys.

Install Instructions:

Download, unzip and run.

Known Issues
  • Occasional audio issues after colliding with block
  • Character has trouble escaping small pits without taking damage
  • Game Over soundeffect  does not always play
  • Difficulty modes are bugged and will be fully implemented at a later date
